DataElement.preferredName: Laboratory Procedure Urine Protein to Creatinine Ratio Measurement Performed Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A response used to indicated the date on which a procedure that involves testing the fluid that is excreted by the kidney to determine the ratio of total protein compared to creatinine present in a sample was completed.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Laboratory Procedure Urine Protein to Creatinine Ratio Measurement Performed
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting._The fluid that is excreted by the kidneys.  It is stored in the bladder and discharged through the urethra._The determination of the ratio of total protein compared to creatinine present in a sample. The measurement may be expressed as a ratio or percentage._Executed and carried through to completion.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A procedure for critical evaluation; a means of determining the presence, quality, or truth of something.

Concepts.definition: Any procedure that involves testing or manipulating a sample of blood, urine, or other body substance in a laboratory setting.

Property.preferredName: Urine Protein to Creatinine Ratio Measurement Performed
Property.preferredDefinition: The fluid that is excreted by the kidneys.  It is stored in the bladder and discharged through the urethra.:The determination of the ratio of total protein compared to creatinine present in a sample. The measurement may be expressed as a ratio or percentage.:Executed and carried through to completion.

Concepts.definition: The fluid that is excreted by the kidneys.  It is stored in the bladder and discharged through the urethra.
The determination of the ratio of total protein compared to creatinine present in a sample. The measurement may be expressed as a ratio or percentage.
Executed and carried through to completion.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.origin: ECOG CRF:Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
